mapper.select: select gender,round(count(*)/(select count(*) from tbl_user where grade_name!='admin')*100,2) count from TBL_USER where grade_name!='admin' and out_date is null group by gender

select age,round(count(*)/(select count(*) from tbl_user where grade_name!='admin' and out_date is null)*100,2) total from ( select case when agegroup='1' or agegroup='0' then '10대' when agegroup='2' then '20대' when agegroup='3' then '30대' when agegroup='4' then '40대' when agegroup='5' then '50대' when agegroup='6' then '60대' when agegroup='7' then '70대' when agegroup='8' then '80대' when agegroup='9' then '90대' end age from ( select userid, birth, round((to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy')- substr(birth, 1,4)+1 )/10) agegroup from tbl_user where out_date is null) ) group by age order by age
select to_date(join_date) day ,count(*) join from TBL_USER where to_date(join_date)>=(to_date(sysdate)-7) group by to_date(join_date) order by to_date(join_date)
select to_date(reg_date) day ,sum(pay_price) totalsales from TBL_PAYMENT where pay_condition='Y' and to_date(reg_date)>=(to_date(sysdate)-7) group by to_date(reg_date)

select perfomtype type,to_date(r.RES_DATE) day ,sum(t.SELLED) totalselled from TBL_RESERVATION r join TBL_TICKET t on r.TICKET_SEQ = t.TICKET_SEQ where to_date(r.RES_DATE)>=to_date(sysdate)-7 group by to_date(r.RES_DATE),perfomtype order by day
